# awsappstream_user (Data Source)

Reads information about an AppStream user. The user is uniquely identified by the user name and authentication type.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "awsappstream_user" "example" {
  authentication_type = "USERPOOL"
  user_name           = "example@example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `authentication_type` (String) The authentication type associated with the user. Valid values are `API`, `SAML`, `USERPOOL`, or `AWS_AD`.
- `user_name` (String) The email address of the AppStream user. Email addresses are **case-sensitive**.

### Read-Only

- `arn` (String) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppStream user.
- `created_time` (String) The timestamp when the user was created, in RFC 3339 format.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether the user is enabled.
- `first_name` (String) The first (given) name of the user.
- `id` (String) A synthetic identifier for the user, composed of the authentication type and user name in the format `<authentication_type>|<user_name>`.
- `last_name` (String) The last (family) name of the user.
- `status` (String) The status of the user as reported by AWS.
